forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 44F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 34F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 2C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 35F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
